strong.a: CLICK HERE TO VIEW TONIGHT'S SCHOOL BOARD MEETING

em.strong: DUE TO THE PANDEMIC CRISIS, TONIGHT'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES MEETING WILL ONLY BE OPEN TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND ESSENTIAL DISTRICT 50 STAFF. THE COMMUNITY CAN ACCESS THE BOARD MEETING VIA LIVESTREAM. PUBLIC FORUM WILL BE SUSPENDED DURING THIS PANDEMIC CRISIS. ANY QUESTIONS CAN BE EMAILED TO GRAVESJ@GWD50.ORG

a.title: Go to comments for Board Mtg. LiveSTREAM

span.a: CLICK HERE TO SEE A DISTANCE LEARNING LETTER WITH MORE INSTRUCTIONS!

p.em: *Your child will need a hard copy workbook in order to complete the new choice boards for each grade level.*

strong.a: CLICK HERE TO VIEW THE VIRTUAL TOWN HALL!

strong.a: All schools in Greenwood School District 50 will be closed from April 1 through April 30th as ordered by the S.C. Governor.

em.span: Greenwood School District 50 is committed to the principle of equal opportunity. It is the policy of the District not to discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, disability, or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state, or local laws. Please contact Gerald Witt, Assistant Superintendent of Administration at 864-941-5400 if you have questions.
Inquiries regarding nondiscrimination policies should be made to the Title IX Coordinator:
Gerald Witt, Assistant Superintendent for Administration, 864-941-5400, PO Box 248 Greenwood SC 29648
If you have any questions regarding our website, please contact the district webmaster at

p.span: If you are trying to enroll a new student in our district, please contact 864-941-5483 for more information. Thank you for your continued support and patience during this crisis!

span.strong: These procedures will be enforced at Emerald & Greenwood High School on Friday!

a.title: Go to comments for Policy Procedures

span.div: Parents of all rising 7th graders must provide proof that they have received a booster of the TDAP vaccine after their 7th birthday. Your child will not be allowed to come to school until proof is provided. This is required by state law. Thank you for helping us keep our students healthy!

a.title: Go to comments for TDap
